Subject: Obsolete version of Windows
Description:
Hi Support,

Good Day!

We would like to ask how PingCastle detects obsolete version of Windows? Is there a database of all Windows version which the tool checks? Or do you have an official Microsoft article where you base the obsolete versions?

Thanks!
What_We_Know__c: PingCastle uses the Microsoft docs that contains the EoS,and then include a check in the reports.
Next_Steps__c: Close the case as customer is ok with it.
Solution_Comment__c:
Symptom
Customer would like to know how PingCastle detects obsolete version of Windows.


Resolution
PingCastle is using the Microsoft docs and then include a check in the reports.
